entry.title: Europe Keeps Its Ski Slopes Open Despite Omicron
entry.content: Wide use of the European Union’s digital Covid-19 pass has encouraged skiers to take to the slopes in a boost to ski-lift operators and other local businesses.

entry.title: The WorldWantsGreen Hydrogen. NamibiaSays It Can Deliver.
entry.content: The southern African nation of sun-laden deserts and wind-swept coastline is aiming to develop a hydrogen industry from renewable sources to meet growing global demand.

entry.title: Haitians Hoping to Reach U.S. Stranded in Chile, Across Americas
entry.content: Chile’s presidential vote will decide the fate of the tens of thousands of Haitian migrants living there. If hard-line immigration policies are adopted, many of them might head to the U.S. border.
